Hey,
Sorry it took me so long to reply to my own question,
I just got hit with my first round of midterms.

I made sure that I had all the plugins
.maven/plugins/maven-sdocboc...etc
.maven/repository/jimi/jars/jimi*jar

I cd into the directory that is created after
unpacking heretix-src.tar.gz and type 

Here is the output.

Thanks very much for your time in advance.
Best,
Yousef Ourabi

PS: I configured CVS through Eclipse and I saw two
ArchiveOpenCrawler modules? Is this normal? Also I am
assuming that is the right module?
